title: Are forum postings unusually low?
content:
Just curious---on the forum page there's that list of top ten posters. Typically you'd need to be averaging close to 5 posts a day, sometimes more, to crack the list. Earlier today I noticed number 10 had just 23 posts in the last 10 days---lowest I've ever seen it since I began hanging around these forums a few months ago. At this rate, I'll eventually crack the top ten by virtue of the list sliding down until it hits me (I think I average maybe one post a day).

Are a lot of typophiles on holidays, are just too busy with projects that they don't have time to post?
author: Gary Long
